description.en: A compact crossbody pouch with a clean rectangular shape and front zipper pocket for quick access. Fits daily essentials like phone, wallet, passport, and small items—ideal for travel and everyday carry. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便拉链斜挎小方包，简洁方形外观，前置拉链口袋便于快取。可放手机、钱包、护照及随身小物，适合旅行与日常出行。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：金属/尼龙拉链（可选 YKK）
背带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：挂钩与 D 环等（电镀颜色可定制）

en.Pockets: 1 main compartment + front zip pocket + inner pocket (optional)
en.Use Case: Travel organizer, daily essentials, city walk
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–24cm × 高 14–18cm × 深 5–8cm（可定制）
zh.口袋结构: 1 主仓 + 前拉链袋 + 内袋（可选）
zh.适用场景: 旅行收纳、日常随身、城市出行
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
